title: Amazon says distraction of Olympics, Trump assassination attempt contributed to weak forecast

title: Japan stocks plunge 5% with Asia markets broadly lower after Wall Street sell-off

title: Intel to cut 15% of workforce, reports quarterly guidance miss

content: China is not planning additional stimulus for the second half of the year, according to officials from the economic planning agency and finance ministry.

title: Putin's Trader: How Russian hackers stole millions from U.S. investors
